void set_master_priority_pad()
{
  MEMORY[0x400200C] = 399;
  MEMORY[0x4002200] = 0x10000;
  MEMORY[0x4002210] = 16777225;
  MEMORY[0x4002214] = 5242980;
  MEMORY[0x4002220] = 100663305;
  MEMORY[0x4002224] = 16778240;
  MEMORY[0x4002230] = 33554445;
  MEMORY[0x4002234] = 6291712;
  MEMORY[0x4002240] = 16777225;
  MEMORY[0x4002244] = 5242980;
  MEMORY[0x4002250] = 536871433;
  MEMORY[0x4002254] = 327685500;
  MEMORY[0x4002260] = 6554121;
  MEMORY[0x4002264] = 2097216;
  MEMORY[0x4002290] = 16777225;
  MEMORY[0x4002294] = 4194432;
  MEMORY[0x40022C0] = 16777225;
  MEMORY[0x40022C4] = 6553728;
  MEMORY[0x4002310] = 536887052;
  MEMORY[0x4002314] = 327685500;
  MEMORY[0x40023A0] = 6553613;
  MEMORY[0x40023A4] = 2097216;
  MEMORY[0x40023B0] = 536872203;
  MEMORY[0x40023B4] = 327685500;
  MEMORY[0x4002480] = 536871433;
  MEMORY[0x4002484] = 327685500;
  MEMORY[0x40031C0] = 41955077;
  MEMORY[0x40031C8] = 251658495;
  MEMORY[0x40031CC] = 95;
  MEMORY[0x40031D0] = 1056964703;
}
